Business Information: Everything you could possibly need to have you dressed and ready for dance class!  We are the largest dancewear supplier in the Southeast, but still have a very small feeling of a boutique.  Everyone who works here is a dancer so you can feel confident that you are receiving service from people who "live in and love" what they sale.  We also carry beautiful gymnastic leotards, bra tops, hot pants, rhinestones, marching band shoes, danceline and majorette boots and batons.  We carry every dance shoe you can imagine and a full line of ballroom shoes for every style of ballroom available.

DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse is where Shoe Lovers go to find brands and styles that are in season and on trend. Each store features 25,000+ pairs of designer shoes for men and women from brands like Nike, Cole Haan, Sperry Top-Sider, Puma, Dr. Scholls, New Balance, TOMS, Vince Camuto and more. And shoes are just the beginning. Handbags, accessories, and kids’ shoes are also there—ready for customers to find just what they need. Plus, our free Rewards program, DSW Rewards, gives perks to its members (like Rewards certificates, offers, and other great stuff). Just shop, earn, and enjoy—it’s as easy as that. Because shoes say a lot about you—so say something great. 
  
DSW (Designer Shoe Warehouse) Inc. is a leading branded footwear and accessories retailer that offers a huge selection of brand name and designer footwear and accessories for women, men, and kids. DSW opened its first store in July 1991 in Dublin, Ohio, and has since grown to operate more than 400 stores across the United States, as well small format shop-in-shop locations. 
  
The DSW brand promise is “Designer shoes. Warehouse prices.” and the company delivers an experience of “breathtaking assortment, irresistible value, and simple convenience.” DSW stores average approximately 22,000 square feet and stock nearly 25,000 pairs of shoes per location.

Hayes Shoes, in Birmingham, AL, is the area's leading shoe store serving Birmingham, Trussville and the surrounding areas. Hayes Shoes has been proudly servicing its customers since 1962. We carry safety and comfort shoes, steel toed shoes, western shoes, durable work shoes and much more. For your next shoe purchase, visit Hayes Shoes in Birmingham.

Shoe Corp of Birmingham offers a range of work boots, athletic shoes and shower sandals in various styles, colors and sizes for men and women. It provides innersole, socks and laces. The company also offers a variety of slippers, court shoes ties and safety toe work boots. Shoe Corp of Birmingham serves jails, prisons, boot camps, hospitals and canteens.

Payless ShoeSource, founded in 1956, is one of the largest, specialty family footwear retailers in the Western Hemisphere. It manages a network of more than 4,500 stores in the United States, the Caribbean, Puerto Rico, Canada and Central America. The chain s stores offer products from the Airwalk, American Eagle and Champion brands. Payless ShoeSource provides products for children, men and women. The chain also offers a variety of accessories, such as handbags, belts, hats, wallets and sunglasses. It sells sandals, slippers, work and fashion boots, and casual and dress shoes. In addition, the chain provides online shopping and shipping services. Payless ShoeSource is a part of Collective Brands.

About TitleMax 
TitleMax is a privately-owned business based in Savannah, Georgia. The Company is one of the largest title lending companies in the United States with more than 500 Stores in seven states.  
Mission 
Our Company Mission is to provide financial products to people without access to traditional credit alternatives. TitleMax seeks to offer these products at the lowest rates in the industry.  
Core Values 
The Company executes its mission with employees who conduct themselves according to the Company's core values:  
Excellence  
Integrity  
Respect  
Enthusiasm  
Why do more than 1,000 new customers choose TitleMax every day? 
TitleMax charges up to 50% less than the competition.  
TitleMax has over 500 convenient locations.  
TitleMax staff is customer-oriented and professional.  
TitleMax has a quick and easy approval process with no credit check.  
TitleMax does not require customers to have insurance on their vehicle.
